title: Level 7 Mastery Camille

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body: I played since her release and I got her to level 7, by playing her in the jungle with full attack speed runes (+35% Atk Spd & +9 Armour). She's pretty good in the jungle cause she's really mobile and has relatively fast wave clear once you get started. :P

replies.body: Ive been strugging to get level 7 irelia for the past month and you do it with Camille in three days.... fml

Its generally easier with newer champions than it is with old ones because of how the S formula works.

You get S if you get a score that is higher than the average good score of that champion.

Camille has been out for a few days, so while there are some good ones (shown here obviously) there are also tons of people who haven't figured her out yet, and so get bad scores, this brings her average score down, meaning you don't need as good of a score to get S.

Irelia on the other hand is as old as time itself, so there are tons of Irelia mains and 1 tricks out there that have been playing her for years and years, and they bring her average score up, so you need a REALLY good score to get S on her.

So its not fair to yourself to compare getting lvl 7 Camille to lvl 7 Irelia, its completely different. So don't beat yourself up haha

I'm sure you'll get lvl 7 Irelia soon! ^^

So focus on farming and staying alive_ (don't chase kills at risk of yourself)_ and you should get those S's :)
